Title: Increases the penalty of knowingly violating the provisions relating to the appropriate shelter for dogs from a violation to a misdemeanor
Summary: Increases the penalty of knowingly violating the provisions relating to the appropriate shelter for dogs from a violation to a misdemeanor, punishable by imprisonment for not more than one year, or by a fine not less than five hundred dollars nor more than one thousand dollars, or by both.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-b, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to increasing the penalty of knowingly violating the provisions relating to the appropriate shelter for dogs
